## Problem / Motivation

What problem does this feature solve? Is it related to an existing limitation?

## Proposed Solution

A clear description of the desired behavior.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you've considered and why they were not preferred.

## Additional Context

References, papers, or related issues.
